SO GOOD GAME BEST GAME EVER!
My dream is CSGO Pro Player <3

This game isn't any fun. Maybe with the right people, one could have a good time horsing around, but I sure haven't had any fun with it. At a bass level, this games mechanics aren't at all intuitive.... or realistic, there just garbage. I've played far more enjoyable/competitive shooters in the past, and can't say I would recommend this stupid game to anyone. I wish I had never spent the money on this, and I should have asking for a refund at the time of my purchase. .
